Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to talk something over
with you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been asking you to do all kinds of
things for the town's development...
free of charge, no less.
<PAGE>
I've been searching for something that
I can do in return...
<PAGE>
And, I came up with the idea of a
<RED>Gardening Tour</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've prepared a <BLUE>gardening space</BLUE> where
customers can come visit and take in the
garden's beauty.
<PAGE>
I thought you could take care of the
garden's design, and in return you would
receive all <RED>admission fees</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take care of bringing in the
customers. I know plenty of people that
like gardens, some from this very town.
<PAGE>
You should be able to pull in a decent
income if you can create a nice garden.
So, what do you say?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right. I thought you'd be up for it.
Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Well then, we should get into the
details of the Gardening Tour. First,
let me give you this.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's the <GREEN>gardening space blueprint</GREEN>.
After you create a space, try placing
elements to arrange the garden.
<PAGE>
The admission fee moves around based
on the kind and number of things
you place, so try various set ups.
<PAGE>
Ah, yes. Remember that things you
place in the garden space <RED>aren't
included in the placement bonus</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's try to hold the Gardening Tour
<BLUE>day 11 of each season</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
You've got other responsibilities too,
so how about we confirm the tour on
<BLUE>day 2 of each season</BLUE>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent! In that case, let's start
the tour next month.
<PAGE>
If it doesn't go well at first, there's
always the following month! Just have 
fun with it, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the tour's details on
the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
